notes.details: These themes can help you identify the types of narratives the media is telling about your query. This is based on a transfer-learning model we built with the Google News word2vec model and the New York Times annotated corpus.

notes.note: Create subtopics by media type.
notes.details: You can now automatically divide up a topic based on the type of each media the stories are published by. Use this to compare print vs. online coverage, for instance. We have this information for lots of sources (from abyznewslinks.com), but definitely not all sources.
